WorkItem.Description:
I never really know if questions like this should go under "Discussions" or the "Issue Tracker"... oh well here we go:
Whats the plan on the ele t10 modeling?
Â 
The set is in the gearlist - but if you look under the "Set bonuses" in the buffs-tab the only mention of T10 set is the DK's set? And when you start to equip the gear Rawr doesn't seem to "favor" 2nd and 4th piece of the set.
WorkItem.Summary: [Elemental] T10 Set Bonuses not yet implemented

Comments.Message: I've added the baseline for it so they will at least show up in the program, Elemental Dev will still need to actually implement them.

T10 2set bonus will be tricky to implement. I haven't gotten to it yet. I will probably need to redo haste proc implementation, then remodel Elemental Mastery and finally model the set bonus proc as a cooldown lowerer.
T10 4set bonus is simple and implemented.

Hi,
Some news about this implementation?

We have a new 4T10 set bonus now - its not the lower cast time on LvB but longer FS duration.

Any update on this - and the 2T10 modeling?
